purpose: Catalog of 9 safety-critical extracted JS source files to be wired into PhysicsPredictionEngine.ts. Created by SpindleProtection agent for later merge by PhysicsPrediction agent.

PRISM_ADVANCED_KINEMATICS_ENGINE.description: Homogeneous transformation matrices, forward/inverse kinematics, DH parameters, Jacobian computation (MIT 16.07, Stanford CS 223A)

PRISM_CUTTING_MECHANICS_ENGINE.description: Merchant orthogonal cutting model, force analysis, chip formation, and shear-plane mechanics (MIT 2.008, Merchant 1945, Shaw Metal Cutting)

PRISM_CUTTING_PHYSICS.description: Merchant's Circle force decomposition, shear-angle prediction, chip-thickness ratio, and specific cutting energy

PRISM_CUTTING_THERMAL_ENGINE.description: Shear-plane temperature (Trigger-Chao), tool-chip interface thermal model, transient heat partition, and thermal damage prediction (MIT 16.050, Loewen-Shaw)

PRISM_HEAT_TRANSFER_ENGINE.description: 1D/2D steady-state and transient conduction, convection correlations, and radiation models for machining thermal analysis (MIT 2.51, MIT 16.050)

PRISM_INTELLIGENT_CUTTING_PARAM_ENGINE.description: Intelligent cutting parameter selection: WOC/DOC defaults by operation type, adaptive roughing, HSM, trochoidal, and finishing parameter envelopes

PRISM_JOHNSON_COOK_DATABASE.description: Johnson-Cook strain-rate sensitivity parameters (A, B, n, C, m, T_melt) for steels, aluminum, titanium, nickel alloys, and copper (MIT 3.22)

PRISM_PHASE3_MANUFACTURING_PHYSICS.description: Phase 3 thermal model for cutting zones, power prediction, and multi-source physics aggregation (MIT 2.810, MIT 2.094, MIT 2.830, MIT 3.22)

PRISM_RIGID_BODY_DYNAMICS_ENGINE.description: Rigid body dynamics engine stub -- definition not found in monolith extraction; registered to window.PRISM_RIGID_BODY_DYNAMICS_ENGINE
